headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. to Report First-Quarter Financial Results on May 6, 2025
summary: Marathon Petroleum Corp. (NYSE: MPC) will host a conference call on Tuesday, May 6, 2025, at 11 a.m. EDT to discuss 2025 first-quarter financial results.

raw.headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. to Report First-Quarter Financial Results on May 6, 2025

headline: Petrobras Q4 Earnings Beat Despite a Decline in Production
summary: As of Dec. 31, 2024, PBR has recorded a net debt of $52,240 million. The company ended the year with cash and cash equivalents of $3,271 million.

headline: Very Bad News For Energy Stocks
summary: Energy stocks are in decline, with the sell-off potentially continuing. Learn which high-yield energy stocks could be great buying opportunities right now.
